title.narrative: Output 2.2 - Parliaments capacities for an effective oversight of the security sector involving defense and security committees is developped

description.narrative: # of questions at the Parliaments of Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso related to the defense and security sector and to the security situation in the Liptako Gourma region

title.narrative: Outcome 3 - Improved effectiveness and professionalism of the security institutions involved in the Liptako Gourma Region
Outcome 3 - Improved effectiveness and professionalism of the security institutions involved in the Liptako Gourma Region
Outcome 2 - Increase confidence and trust by the population of the Liptako Gourma Region in the governmental security institutions.

description.narrative: 1. Level of trust and confidence in the security sector actors reported by the population (gender/age) in the Liptako Gourma Region; 2. Perception of a stronger cohesion, respect and confidence between the population and the ISFs.

title.narrative: Outcome 2 - Increase confidence and trust by the population of the Liptako Gourma Region in the governmental security institutions.

description.narrative: 1. Level of trust and confidence in the security sector actors reported by the population (gender/age) in the Liptako Gourma Region; 2. Perception of a stronger cohesion, respect and confidence between the population and the ISFs.

title.narrative: Output 1.1 - Sensitization and communication to key national stakeholders in Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso on the importance and value of democratic control and oversight of the security sector.

description.narrative: In each of the three countries, level of adhesion by key informers and leaders to basic SSRG concepts (Targeted surveys).

title.narrative: Output 1.1 - Sensitization and communication to key national stakeholders in Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso on the importance and value of democratic control and oversight of the security sector.

description.narrative: In each of the three countries, level of adhesion by key informers and leaders to basic SSRG concepts (Targeted surveys).

title.narrative: Output 3.2 - Strengthening local/regional security mechanism and law enforcement institutions operating in the Liptako Gourma Region.

description.narrative:
Institutional framework (laws, policies, procedures and mechanisms) for dealing with gender-based violence
Attitudes and professional practices of security and justice actors towards gender-based violence.

title.narrative: Output 3.2 - Strengthening local/regional security mechanism and law enforcement institutions operating in the Liptako Gourma Region.

description.narrative:
Institutional framework (laws, policies, procedures and mechanisms) for dealing with gender-based violence
Attitudes and professional practices of security and justice actors towards gender-based violence.

title.narrative: Output 2.3 - Strengthening of external oversight institutions through media and civil society engagement, especially in the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Level and quality of CSO initiatives to proactively channel citizen concerns on security and defense issues at the national and local levels and produce information on the defense and security sector.

title.narrative: Output 2.3 - Strengthening of external oversight institutions through media and civil society engagement, especially in the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Level and quality of CSO initiatives to proactively channel citizen concerns on security and defense issues at the national and local levels and produce information on the defense and security sector.

title.narrative: Output 1.2 - Support to a process of assessment, revision, harmonization of the regional/national security and defence related legal framework with a specific attention to the regional police and judiciary capacities to collaborate on criminal matters.

description.narrative: Level of progress in the revision, dissemination and application of security-related policies and legislative framework in Niger, Burkina Faso and Mali.

title.narrative: Output 1.2 - Support to a process of assessment, revision, harmonization of the regional/national security and defence related legal framework with a specific attention to the regional police and judiciary capacities to collaborate on criminal matters.

description.narrative: Level of progress in the revision, dissemination and application of security-related policies and legislative framework in Niger, Burkina Faso and Mali.

title.narrative: Outcome 1 - Contribution to the creation of a national and regional environment conducive for/supportive of enhanced oversight and monitoring of the security sector.

description.narrative: Level of progress made by Mali, Burkina Faso and Niger to comply with the ECOWAS Policy Framework for SSRG

title.narrative: Outcome 1 - Contribution to the creation of a national and regional environment conducive for/supportive of enhanced oversight and monitoring of the security sector.

description.narrative: Level of progress made by Mali, Burkina Faso and Niger to comply with the ECOWAS Policy Framework for SSRG

title.narrative: Output 2.1 - Strengthening exchanges and communications initiatives on security related issues between state security institutions, government representatives and citizens of the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Number of communications and exchanges initiatives organized by Governmental authorities and security institutions on security related issues (Including on the abuses committed by the SDS and on the existing complaint mechanisms) in Liptako Gourma, gathering citizens, local government representatives and law enforcement institutions of the Liptako Gourma region.

title.narrative: Output 2.1 - Strengthening exchanges and communications initiatives on security related issues between state security institutions, government representatives and citizens of the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Number of communications and exchanges initiatives organized by Governmental authorities and security institutions on security related issues (Including on the abuses committed by the SDS and on the existing complaint mechanisms) in Liptako Gourma, gathering citizens, local government representatives and law enforcement institutions of the Liptako Gourma region.

title.narrative: Output 3.3 - Improved security sector response to GBV in the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Number of security actors trained and who report on increased understanding and readiness to respond to GBV, disaggregated by sex, rank, position, institution and community.

title.narrative: Output 3.3 - Improved security sector response to GBV in the Liptako Gourma region.

description.narrative: Number of security actors trained and who report on increased understanding and readiness to respond to GBV, disaggregated by sex, rank, position, institution and community.

title.narrative: Output 1.3 - Implementation of system of monitoring of the progress made to ensure compliance of the national legislations, policies and practices with the ECOWAS Policy Framework on SSRG.

description.narrative: Numbers of monitoring reports produced.

title.narrative: Output 1.3 - Implementation of system of monitoring of the progress made to ensure compliance of the national legislations, policies and practices with the ECOWAS Policy Framework on SSRG.

description.narrative: Numbers of monitoring reports produced.

title.narrative: Output 3.1 - Strengthening technical and operating capacities of institutions responsible for providing oversight of defense and security sector resource management processes

description.narrative: Oversight institutions are in capacity to produce reports on resource management of defense and security institutions operating in the Liptako Gourma region.

title.narrative: Output 3.1 - Strengthening technical and operating capacities of institutions responsible for providing oversight of defense and security sector resource management processes

description.narrative: Oversight institutions are in capacity to produce reports on resource management of defense and security institutions operating in the Liptako Gourma region.
